thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Sara Serrano Gatica
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Sara Serrano Gatica

author: Sara Serrano Gatica
title: Sara Serrano Gatica
text:
I really liked that when my credit card didn't accept the payment, someone from the call center immediately called me and tried to help me.
The only problem is that you assumed that I speak English, and I do, but I'm in Chile... where 99.9% of people only speak Spanish. The email and the person who called me only spoke English... so you should be prepared for someone from a different country.
